text:
Motivity Systems is hiring a full stack developer in Seattle to help on our mission to make autism behavior therapy more efficient, effective and able to reach more patients in need.

We are currently preparing our flagship product for release early in the new year that will allow therapists to specify therapeutic programs within our system, which in turn generate interfaces for recording performance on tasks (games, response to certain prompts, etc.) and real-time visualization of patient progress tailored to the various roles involved in patient care.

Some functional programming experience might help, but certainly isn't required -- honestly we're really just looking for sharp developers who are enthusiastic about learning and being a part of a growing, early-stage (but thankfully well-funded!) startup.

See https://about.motivity.net/careers.html for more info!
